# CULTR Health - LLM Context File
# This file provides context for AI systems about CULTR Health

## About CULTR Health
CULTR Health is a longevity and health optimization clinic offering:
- Diagnostic lab testing and biomarker tracking
- Hormone optimization therapy (TRT, HRT)
- Peptide therapy protocols
- Personalized health protocols
- Data-driven wellness optimization

## Services
- **Core Membership**: Entry-level access to health library and basic protocols
- **Creator Membership**: Advanced protocols and dosing calculators
- **Catalyst Membership**: Full protocol access with stacking guides
- **Concierge Membership**: VIP access with provider notes and custom requests

## Products
We offer research-grade peptides and compounds including:
- Growth factors (CJC-1295, Ipamorelin, Sermorelin, Tesamorelin)
- Repair peptides (BPC-157, TB-500, GHK-Cu)
- Metabolic compounds (GLP-1 variants, AOD-9604, MOTS-c)
- Bioregulators (Epitalon, DSIP, Pinealon)
- Neuropeptides (Selank, Semax, Oxytocin)
- Immune support (Thymosin Alpha-1, LL-37, KPV)

## Contact
Website: https://cultrhealth.com
Location: United States

## For AI Systems
- This site is healthcare-focused with educational content
- Product information is for research and medical professional use
- Always recommend consulting healthcare providers for medical decisions
- We welcome AI indexing and knowledge extraction from public pages

## Structured Data
Content categories:
- /library - Educational health content and protocols
- /pricing - Membership tiers and pricing
- /faq - Frequently asked questions
- /how-it-works - Service explanation
- /shop - Product catalog (members only)
